description:
Luffy appears on the field of battle with a ferocious sense of urgency. Ace could be executed at any minute, and the rubber-man`s refusal to back down impresses even the most feared men in all the world!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La clique du Chapeau de Paille débarque. La bataille de plus en plus intense
Mugiwara Team Touchaku Fuunkyuu o Tsugeru Senjou
Straw Hat Team Arrives! Tension Grows at the Battlefield
Команда Мугивары прибыла! Критический момент на поле боя
麦わらチーム到着 風雲急を告げる戦場
